item.description:
Meet other NOBO (north of Boston) Asian families! Julie and Tori are opening their home (with a fenced yard, swingset, ride ons, oh my!) and providing yummy Korean snacks. Feel free to bring other snacks to share.

This playdate is limited to 6 families (for safe off-street parking). Please DO NOT include your children in your RSVP - instead let us know in the comments.

It's OK to come later than 10 - Tori naps later in the day. If Friday is not a good day for you, please let us know in the comments section. Julie and Tori can also host on a Wednesday.

Allergy Alert:  We have 2 bunnies and 1 chinchilla, caged.
item.how_to_find_us: Forest St is off Rt 114. We are also 10 min from rt 128 and rt 93. Call if lost 978-304-1150.
item.name: NOBO Playdate
